mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_title, banner_image, thumbnail_image from notices where notice_type = 'E' and is_delete = 'N';
select notice_no, notice_title, banner_image, thumbnail_image from notices where notice_no = #{eventNo}
select b.banner_no, b.notice_no, b.banner_type, n.banner_image, n.thumbnail_image, n.url, n.notice_title from banners b join notices n on b.notice_no = n.notice_no where n.notice_type = 'E'
